_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Different ways of explaining why the Bud: If you like, love, and enjoy form, feeling, perception, choices, consciousness, and don’t truly see the cessation of consciousness
If you don’t like, love, and enjoy form, feeling, perception, choices, consciousness, and you truly see the cessation of consciousness
If you like, love, and enjoy existence, and don’t truly see the cessation of continued existence
If you don’t like, love, and enjoy existence, and you truly see the cessation of continued existence
If you like, love, and enjoy grasping, and don’t truly see the cessation of grasping
If you don’t like, love, and enjoy grasping, and you truly see the cessation of grasping
